column4: morning, why have gnome-terminal stopped working under Compiz? Gedit's Session-saver plugin stopped working at all ? and Rhythmbox can't save unchecked plugings ?
one at a time helps. to address the first thing you asked.  I'm using gnome-terminal and compiz fusion right now.  do you have a specific problem?
yes, I can't even begin to help you until you explain to me what is wrong
